author: andyc
msg: 1) Fixed bug in the UTF-8 reader; wasn't initializing the surrogate
character to -1. This caused the reader to return (char)0 on the
2) Fixed bug in XMLScanner#scanPseudoAttribute; it was assuming that
the entire literal could be read in a single call to scanLiteral.
3) Activated the OneCharReader in the entity manager so that we can
prevent the reader from reading too far ahead and converting the
incoming bytes into characters using the wrong encoding.
